title: Star Guardian Lux Ult Bug
body: I was playing Yasuo recently and their support (Lux) came mid to try and ult kill me. When she tried I put up windwall well before the actual damage hit me. But it went through and killed me. Not a huge deal not like game breaking or anything. Just thought maybe this happened to someone else. Anyway thanks for looking.

replies.body: It's not a bug, Lux's ult is supposed to go through the windwall. It's not a projectile.

Yup! This is working as intended. 

Only projectiles are stopped by Yasuo's windwall.
Thanks you for the reply I will take note of this for future reference.
Vel' Koz, Lux, Turrets, they all go through the wall. It's not a bug.
one time i was playing velkoz against yasuo he used his wall and just stood there as it hit him for the full duration. it took him 3 times to realize that his wall didn't work.
I did not know that I'm not a Yasuo main just played a few games as him.
Another one to be aware of, Viktor's Q-empowered auto attack is also not a projectile. Most Viktor's will happily throw the Q at the wall and auto attack you for the real damage.

Hi lux's ult is similiar to Xerath's Q and as you can see its not projectile, so it has to go trough windwall. Unlike any other skills ETC: jinx ult or nami's ult cant go trough. But anyway i wish best for you on battlefield ;)
Imo, this confusion is far more understandable than those who wonder why Thresh won't proc Relic Shield execute every time.
Haven't seen one of those in a while.
No need for the Snark man. I'm new to playing Yasuo and don't know what it blocks.
I understand but it doesn't change my feeling of seeing these topic pop up every now and then.
As Princess Lux said. The damage doesn't originate from Lux, it happens across the entire length simultaneously. Xerath's Q operates the same way.
